dcterms:creator: J. Carreira
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: Kinetics-400 is a large-scale dataset for action recognition, containing 400 human action classes with a total of 240,000 training videos and 20,000 validation videos, each with an average duration of 10 seconds.
dcterms:title: Kinetics-400

dcterms:creator: J. Carreira
E. Noland
A. Banki-Horvath
C. Hillier
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: Kinetics-600 is an extension of the Kinetics dataset, containing 600 human action classes with a total of 390,000 training videos and 30,000 validation videos, each with an average duration of 10 seconds.
dcterms:title: Kinetics-600

dcterms:creator: R. Goyal
S. Ebrahimi Kahou
V. Michalski
J. Materzynska
S. Westphal
H. Kim
V. Haenel
I. Fruend
P. Yianilos
M. Mueller-Freitag
dcterms:description: Something-Something V2 (SSV2) is a video dataset designed for learning and evaluating visual common sense, containing 169,000 training videos and 25,000 validation videos categorized into 174 motion-centric classes.
dcterms:title: Something-Something V2 (SSV2)

dcterms:creator: K. Soomro
A. R. Zamir
M. Shah
dcterms:description: UCF-101 is a dataset of 101 human action classes from videos in the wild, consisting of 9,500 training videos and 3,500 validation videos.
dcterms:title: UCF-101

dcterms:creator: H. Kuehne
H. Jhuang
E. Garrote
T. Poggio
T. Serre
dcterms:description: HMDB51 is a large video database for human motion recognition, containing 7,000 clips from 51 action categories, with 3,500 training videos and 1,500 validation videos.
dcterms:title: HMDB51

dcterms:creator: C. Gu
C. Sun
D. A. Ross
C. Vondrick
C. Pantofaru
Y. Li
S. Vijayanarasimhan
G. Toderici
S. Ricco
R. Sukthankar
dcterms:description: AVA V2.2 is a challenging dataset for spatio-temporal localization of human actions, containing 211,000 training video segments and 57,000 validation segments.
dcterms:title: AVA V2.2
